name: X and Y Design
tag_list: web-design, logo-design, graphic-design, flash-websites, ecommerce-solutions, web-based-applications, wordpress-templates, internet-research, market-research
overview:
“XandY Design is a professional design agency specializing in Online Digital Branding, Website Design & Development, Logo Design, Flash Websites & Banners, Graphic Design & Print Design.

We are a group of focused people with a taste for classic and timeless excellence in the field of web design and development. Our focus is to work with passion and ensure a strong & satisfied clientÃ¨le for the years to come. Our growth is through the growth of our client testimonial list. Our work culture is artistic & classic combined with modern day intelligence.”

HIGHLIGHTS OF XANDY DESIGN

With collective expertise and core designing knowledge, XandY Design provides web designing services to mid-sized and growing companies. The aim is to deliver high quality design works at an affordable price and quick turnaround time.

With over 5+ years experience in this online industry, we have proved and helped many clients to achieve their business targets and profits. Our thirst to learn makes us strong to render our expertise to our clients.

Our expertise is in eCommerce, Online Shops, Logo Design, Web Design, Brochure Design, and Print Collaterals.

We have not designed for Fortune 500 companies, but for local businesses, and individuals alike and shown better results and got good testimonial from our clients.

For Xandy Design, CLIENTS are the main assets. We believe that our strength is our service support for the clients (individuals/companies). We also provide services to increase their productivity via other online activities like SMO, SEO, SMM and Lead Generation.

If not satisfied with our services, we give full money back guarantee*.
